page.title: 16Shops in Soham
page.content: Soham has a wide range of shops which between them cater for most people's everyday needs. There are several food shops, ranging from small grocers, bakers and sweet shops to a Co-op supermarket. There is a chip shop, a Chinese take-away, Indian restaurant, a fried chicken bar, a restaurant, a cafeteria, and several pubs, some of which serve food. There is also a hardware shop, shoe shops, clothes shop, newsagents, electrical goods and repair shop, video shop, pet shop, chemists, a D.I.Y. shop, a jeweller, a craft shop selling pottery and hand crafts, hairdressers and a barber. People who cannot buy the things they need locally usually travel to Ely, or sometimes to Newmarket or Cambridge.
